bug.author: miguelgfierro
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
There is a bug in the build test process related to pycocotools <denchmark-code>ResolvePackageNotFound: - pycocotools[version='>=2.0']
Could not find conda environment: cv You can list all discoverable environments with `conda info --envs`. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>In which platform does it happen?</denchmark-h>
windows <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the issue?</denchmark-h>
just when installing the current environment <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
possible solution: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cocodataset/cocoapi/issues/169>cocodataset/cocoapi#169</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: fixed with new pipeline and test machines
